subject: Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Nationals catcher Paul Lo Duca injured his left knee during a workout and will travel to Washington next week to be examined by a team doctor. Lo Duca, who signed a $5 million deal for one season as a free agent this off-season, was hurt this week and had a magnetic resonance imaging exam Friday.
